con:testStep.name: script change post data to avoid conflict

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def request = new JsonSlurper().parseText(messageExchange.requestContent)
def ePrice = request.economyPrice def bPrice = request.businessPrice
assert ePrice > 0 && bPrice > 0: "Invalid economyPrice or businessPrice, they must be > 0"
